allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Phase 1 implementation with fixes and documentation

- Fix manual fallback layout in launch-dashboard.sh \(correct 67-33 split\)
- Add missing unbinds to .tmux.conf.unmutable \(swap, zoom, layout toggle\)
- Add comprehensive project documentation \(@prd.md, plan.md, notes.md\)
- Add installation guide \(INSTALL.md\) for WSL setup
- Add CLAUDE.md project instructions for AI assistance
- Add install.sh automation script
- Document exploration findings and fixes in notes.md

Phase 1 core functionality is now complete and ready for WSL testing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\erikc\\Dev\\ATMu" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Add comprehensive documentation and ADR system

- Create README.md with quick start guide and feature overview
- Create session-handoff.md for developer context and next steps
- Create ADR.md documenting 11 architectural decisions
- Create .claude/pre-compact-checklist.md for conversation compaction workflow
- Fix syntax error in .tmux.conf.unmutable \(line 65 escaping\)
- Update CLAUDE.md with ADR references and known issues
- Add .claude/settings.json for project configuration

This completes Phase 1 documentation and establishes ADR practice
for preserving architectural context across conversation compactions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
